channel.title: Learning Python(for the newbies)
channel.description:
Meh, I posted this on another forum, but I might as well share here also.
Here is a package I compiled to help new people learn Python. I [i]could[/i] have just posted a bunch of links, but that would've been no fun. ;) And I got lazy and just made some of the HTML files META redirects...
Anyways, download the [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/78474889/Learning_Python.rar.html]here[/url] and enjoy.
This package consists of: -Python Programming for the Absolute Beginner (compiled HTML file) -Dive into Python(HTML files and python examples) -Pygame package compiled by me(make your own games!) -Places to download Python and Pygame.
